[…] This is why a lot of people advise ignoring the order book entirely. However, I beg to differ (#OrderBooksMatter), and I believe there is a lot of actionable information lurking just beneath the surface. Walls (and orders in general) are a robust signaling mechanism. They allow whales to coordinate with each other, highlight areas of support and resistance, show relative supply and demand (and the voraciousness/desperation thereof), and many other things. […]
